channel.title: maGaming RSS Feed - insider-gaming_com

item.title: All Games Added To Xbox Game Pass In 2025
item.content:encoded:
Xbox Game Pass members have been eating well in 2025, with a bunch of games across every genre offered each month, including Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, and more added to the library this year. Where Xbox has PlayStation beat is by offering its own games Day One on Game Pass, so subscribers don’t end up paying extra for brand-new AAA titles.

There are several tiers of Xbox Game Pass, including Essential, Premium, Ultimate, and PC Game Pass. In the Essential tier, players get over 50 games in the library, no Day One titles, Fortnite Crew, EA Play, and Ubisoft+ Classics. Premium players get access to over 200 games, no Day One launches, but Xbox-published games will be added to the library within 12 months from launch. The rest of it is similar to the Essential tier.

Game Pass Ultimate gives players access to over 500 games, Day One titles, Fortnite Crew, EA Play, and Ubisoft+ Classics, as well as the highest tier of cloud gaming. PC Game Pass provides over 300 games, access to Day One titles, Fortnite Crew, EA Play, and more than 50 Ubisoft+ Classics. All subscription tiers, except PC Game Pass, provide access to all supported platforms, online console multiplayer, and cloud gaming.

item.title: New Escape from Tarkov Issue Causing Accounts To Be Wiped
item.content:encoded:
Update – It appears that this issue affected a select few players, with the malicious operator in question posting an explanation on social media of what happened. They said the account wipes were carried out due to a vulnerability exposed by Steam account linking. This seems to have since been patched, while Battlestate Games still hasn’t provided an official statement.

In recent hours, some of the most prominent personalities in the Escape from Tarkov community have taken to social media to express concerns about a new phenomenon. What has been labelled a ‘vulnerability’ by some is causing Escape from Tarkov accounts to be wiped and altered by what is assumed to be rogue operators.

Battlestate Games has stressed it’s aware of the issue and is working on it, but no official statement has been posted.

Has Your Tarkov Account Been Wiped?

Hours ago, posts started surfacing on social media from users impacted by this Tarkov account wiping issue. In some cases, big-name streamers were recorded suffering from the problem live on air. Dr Lupo was one of the content creators struck by the anomaly.

In a comment under one of the investigative posts, Nikita Buyanov, the head of the studio at Battlestate Games, wrote:

already took measures. investigating

Here’s what the players are figuring out about the issue from what they’ve learned:

  • There’s a vulnerability ‘somewhere’ that malicious operators are leaning on to access and reset accounts of other players, most notably prolific players.
  • Whoever is doing this is able to bypass two-factor authentication, as accounts that have the security layers in place are reporting this problem occurring.
  • It was thought this issue was related to Escape from Tarkov: Arena, but that most likely isn’t the case.

We’ve reached out to Battlestate Games for confirmation on what’s happening.

In August 2024, a technical malfunction caused player profiles to suffer from unwanted wipes. It was reported that ‘tens of thousands’ of profiles were impacted by this back-end issue, which led to an irrevocable data wipe.

Popular creator Onepeg explained on social media:

My tarkov account got reset. Gg boys.

I did not use the wiki at all for at least the last few days. I haven’t clicked on any weird links. This has to be some other vulnerability.

pfp got changed to a QR code that forwards to a 7 second long youtube video calling me a bitch lmao at least these guys have a sense of humor.

One user took to socials to stress how impactful the issue had been, with their account being stripped of all progress at a pivotal progression point:

This issue has struck amidst a lengthy Twitch Drops campaign that’s stuffing players’ accounts full of loot, which adds extra fuel to the fire and insult to injury.

Have you been hit by this Escape from Tarkov issue? Let us know what you’ve lost on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Divinity players won’t need to play the old games before Divinity 3

MOBILE APP

Real-time news, exclusive podcasts, push alerts, and a better reading experience.

Available on iOS & Android

item.title: Jujutsu: Zero Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Jujutsu: Zero monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including extra Clan Rolls and much more.

Jujutsu: Zero is a Roblox action RPG where players develop and strengthen their sorcerer by mastering cursed techniques, joining powerful clans, and defeating increasingly challenging enemies. Unlike simple button-mashing games, success demands mastering the parry system, where perfectly timing your blocks as enemy attack indicators close creates openings for devastating counters.

What sets Jujutsu: Zero apart is its clan system, where your bloodline determines your passive abilities and stat bonuses. The game’s progression feels meaningful as you evolve from a Grade 4 novice toward the coveted Special Grade status, unlocking increasingly powerful techniques along the way. The premium currency, Lumens, fuels the gacha system where you’ll roll for powerful cursed techniques on specialized banners.

While grinding is always an option, savvy players accelerate their journey by hunting down promotional codes that developers regularly release during updates and holidays.

Active Jujutsu: Zero Codes

  • BETAout – 200x Clan Rolls and 3,500x Lumens
  • CHARM –1x Basic Charm
  • smallfixPATCH – 1,500x Lumens, 3x XP Vows and 15x Clan Rolls

Expired Jujutsu: Zero Codes

As of December 2025, there are no expired codes for the Roblox game Jujutsu: Zero.

How To Redeem Jujutsu: Zero Codes

Follow these steps to activate all the active codes in Jujutsu: Zero:

  1. Launch Jujutsu: Zero in Roblox
  2. Click on the button labelled Codes in the main menu
  3. Type or paste the code into the text box
  4. Click on Redeem and claim your freebie

How To Get More Jujutsu: Zero Codes

Jujutsu: Zero codes are typically released through the game’s community and developer channels, but they don’t appear automatically in-game. The best places to catch them early are the official Discord server, where developers post in the announcements channel, the Roblox game page itself, and Studio Resonance’s social media accounts where they regularly share updates and special events.

Codes often come out around game milestones, major updates, or special events like the recent beta launch. But if you’re only checking sporadically, you’ll very easily miss them because no alert system tells players when a code drops—or when it stops working. Because of this, the easiest strategy is to save this guide in your browser and check back instead of trying to monitor every source yourself. This page is refreshed as soon as fresh codes go live, and any codes that have expired are taken out quickly so you always see only the ones that still work.

Be sure to check out our Insider Gaming Discord Server, where you can start up some fun new discussions about the best gem-hunting Roblox games.

If you’re a big fan of Roblox and play a lot of games, you can also check out our code guides for other popular Roblox titles like Steal an Anime, Steal Star Wars, and Mini Empires.

item.title: Marvel Rivals Season 6 Exact Release Date & Start Times—Confirmed Content & More
item.content:encoded:
Marvel Rivals Season 6 carries on the live-service shooter’s comic book story in 2026. It’s the first proper content of the new year, and it’s adding the odd brash and brutal face or two. If you’re looking for the Marvel Rivals Season 6 start date and times, Insider Gaming has everything you need to know.

It’s been a wild and exciting 12 months for Marvel Rivals. NetEase has added new characters, from Gambit to Rogue. The player count is steady—as is your aim—and 2026 signals the next era of the game.

This guide has all the Season 6 info you need.

When Does Marvel Rivals Season 6 Release?

The official Marvel Rivals Season 6 start date is locked in for January 16, giving you plenty of time to wrap up the previous season and enjoy a hearty Christmas before starting S6!

You’ve got plenty of time to stuff your face with Turkey, beverages, chocolate, and anything else you can get your holiday hands on. Once the Christmas period starts to tail off and we get into the real meat of 2026, NetEase games will drop Season 6.

The 5.5 mini-season drop was fun, but you know that these are the proper updates.

Marvel Rivals Season 6 Start Times

It’s not 100% confirmed, but based on previous, major Marvel Rivals updates, Season 6 will first begin at 2 AM PT on January 16.

This likely isn’t the first live-service season hub you’ve checked, so you know the usual factors that go into determining these start times: Previous seasons and consistency.

Here are some exact start times in key regions, using the last few Marvel Rivals seasons as our guiding light.

All Marvel Rivals Season 6 Content So Far

Deadpool is the star addition in Season 6, and there will, of course, be new maps, game modes, and much more to come.

We don’t fully know what’s arriving in Season 6 yet. However, it’s hard to ignore the incoming presence of Marvel’s savant of sarcasm. It was revealed that Deadpool was coming to Marvel Rivals in 2026—and that moment is in Marvel Rivals Season 6.

Season 6 should be a big (and loud) one, thanks to the arrival of Deadpool and other content. What are you hoping to see in the first new season of 2026? Share some ideas via the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server.

If you haven’t already, read about who the Deadpool voice actor is rumored to be, and the interesting Gacha System released in 2025.
